import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get filter sets by type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/filters/sets/for/type/{FilterSetType}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all filter sets matching the specified type. Filter sets are used throughout the system for views, rules, custom field conditions, and app-specific filtering.

**Common Filter Set Types**:
- `View.Filters` - Filter criteria saved with views
- `Rule.Condition` - Conditions used in automation rules
- `CustomField.Condition` - Conditions for custom field visibility/behavior
- `KbArticle.Condition` - Conditions for knowledge base articles
- `App.SparePool.Criteria` - Spare pool application criteria

**Authentication**: Supports both user authentication and app authorization tokens.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"FilterSetType","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The type of filter sets to retrieve. Use dot notation format (e.g., 'View.Filters', 'Rule.Condition').","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["CustomField.Condition","KbArticle.Condition","Rule.Condition","View.Filters","App.SparePool.Criteria","App.Marketing.Criteria","App.Jamf.Criteria"]},"example":"View.Filters"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

of filter values within this set."},"FilterMatches":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Universal filter structure used across all search endpoints (Tickets, Assets, Users). Each FilterMatch targets a specific facet and provides criteria through either the `Id` field (for entity references) or the `Value` field (for expressions).\n\n## Supported Entity Types\n\n| Entity | Facet Key Reference | Total Facets |\n|--------|---------------------|-------------|\n| Tickets | `TicketSearchFacetKey` | 103 |\n| Assets | `AssetSearchFacetKey` | 75 |\n| Users | `UserSearchFacetKey` | 41 |\n\n## Field Usage by Facet Type\n\n| Facet Type | Use Field | Example |\n|------------|-----------|--------|\n| Entity reference (status, agent, location) | `Id` | `{\"Facet\": \"status\", \"Id\": \"guid-here\"}` |\n| Date expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"createddate\", \"Value\": \"range:thisweek\"}` |\n| Numeric expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"purchasedprice\", \"Value\": \"numoperator:greaterthan:100\"}` |\n| Keyword search | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"keyword\", \"Value\": \"laptop\"}` |\n| Boolean facet | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"isurgent\", \"Value\": \"true\"}` |\n\n## Filter Combination Logic\n\n- **Default (AND)**: All filters are combined with AND logic\n- **OR within groups**: Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR logic\n- **Exclusion**: Set `Negative: true` to exclude matching records\n\n## Expression Syntax Reference\n\nSee `DateExpressionSyntax` and `NumericExpressionSyntax` schemas for detailed syntax documentation.\n\n## Universal Facets\n\nSix facets are shared across all search endpoints: `grade`, `location`, `locationtype`, `role`, `source`, `user`. Populated by the UI when saving filters.","example":"Ticket Status"},"Name":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display label for the selected value. Populated by the UI for saved filters.","example":"Open"},"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID value for entity-reference facets. Use this field when filtering by a specific entity's identifier (e.g., status ID, location ID, user ID).","example":"11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555"},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"String value for expression-based facets. Syntax varies by facet type:\n- Date facets: See `DateExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `range:thisweek`, `date>=01/01/2024`)\n- Numeric facets: See `NumericExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `numoperator:greaterthan:100`)\n- Keyword: Plain text search term\n- Boolean: `true` or `false`","example":"range:thisweek"},"Negative":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"When `true`, excludes records matching this filter instead of including them. Inverts the filter logic.","example":false},"GroupIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0,"description":"Groups filters for OR logic. Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR, then groups are combined with AND. Default value of 0 means all filters use AND logic.","example":0},"Selected":{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"Indicates the filter is active. Always `true` when applying filters via API.","example":true},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the custom field type when this filter targets a custom field. Used when the filter requires a specialized UI editor component."},"SortOrder":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Sort order hint for display purposes when presenting multiple filter options."},"AggregateOperation":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"enum":["and","or"],"description":"Logical operation for aggregate filters. When set, this filter acts as a container combining `Children` filters with the specified operation. Use `and` to require all children match, `or` to match any child."},"Children":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Nested filter conditions for aggregate filters. Only used when `AggregateOperation` is set.
